class.name: integer_controllers/Int32StateController
class.description: The Int32StateController populates all hardware_interface_extensions/Int32StateHandles on the hardware_interface_extensions/Int32StateInterface and publishes data from the handles as a std_msgs/Int32 msg.

class.name: integer_controllers/Int32Controller
